## ğŸš€ Quick Start

```bash
# Install
pip install pydiscobasepro

# Create project with interactive CLI
pydiscobasepro create mybot

# Enter interactive mode
cd mybot
pydiscobasepro interactive

# Run with advanced features
python bot.py
```
